title: Lago Sul
text: Lago Sul is an <a href="Administrative%20region%20%28Brazil%29">administrative region</a> in the <a href="Federal%20District%20%28Brazil%29">Federal District</a> of <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>. It is located on the south side of the eastern shore of <a href="Lake%20Parano%C3%A1">Lake Paranoá</a>, opposite <a href="Bras%C3%ADlia">Brasília</a>. <a href="Bras%C3%ADlia%20International%20Airport">Presidente Juscelino Kubitschek International Airport</a> is located in the southwesternmost edge of this region. A population of 29,537 people reside in this area.
